resources.string: grab_auth

Client Id must be defined in AndroidManifest.
Code is null or empty.
State received from redirect url does not match with loginSession state.
Redirect uri must be defined in AndroidManifest.
Discovery endpoint response is null.

Token endpoint is missing in discovery endpoint response.

Nonce inside loginSession and the server response does not match.

access_token is missing in token endpoint response.
id_token is missing in token endpoint response.
expires_in is missing in token endpoint response.

Discovery endpoint is missing inside sdk.
Error occurred while fetching discovery endpoint
Scope must be defined in AndroidManifest.
SDK must be initialized before calling other methods.
Supplied loginSession is null
Supplied loginSession does not have any token exchange endpoint
Supplied loginSession does not have any ID token verification endpoint
